effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,206, up to 11,032.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.3 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,183 and Haste by 7,928.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 285,963, and Intellect by 7,261.

Equip: Your harmful and helpful spells have a chance to weave a Thread of Fate between you and your target for 5 sec. Tethered allies gain 5,942 bonus primary while the Thread holds and enemies take 434,549 Cosmic Damage when the Thread breaks.
